entry.notes: Imported from Times Microwave Systems catalog

source_text:
Times Microwave Systems LMR-600
Model: LMR-600
Type: cable
0.590" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 87.0%
Attenuation at 50 MHz: 0.27 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 0.47 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 220 MHz: 0.58 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 0.84 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 1.23 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1800 MHz: 1.8 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1900 MHz: 1.86 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 2400 MHz: 2.1 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 5800 MHz: 3.7 dB/100ft

expected_json.description: 0.590" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
expected_json.notes: Lower loss alternative to LMR-400 for longer runs
